description.subtitle: What way to link the hills?
description.text: We need to move between the hills, so which way may we take? Letâ€™s find a solution to come from A to B. Which one may be the best?

proposedResolutions.title: Glider
proposedResolutions.description: Simply fly with a glider, using naturally occuring currents of rising air in the atmosphere to gain altitude.

proposedResolutions.title: Catapult
proposedResolutions.description: Lets use a catapult! This is a ballistic device that launches a projectile using the sudden release of stored energy.

proposedResolutions.title: Bridge
proposedResolutions.description: A bridge is a structure built to span a physical obstacle constructed to provide passage over the obstacle.

proposedResolutions.title: Aerial Lift
proposedResolutions.description: An aerial lift is a means of transport in which cabins or open chairs are hauled above the ground on cables.
